globalProperty.description: The UUID (or concept map - may be later) of the concept which is a convenient set grouping the vaccine concepts together. If not set, the search is performed against the entire dictionary which may not be optimal in most cases.

The UUID of the concept class to search against. If not provided all type of class will be searched. If the convenient set is provided this may not be necessary. However if both are provided the search is performed agains the set and the class. So if a concept belongs to the set but is not of the specified class it won't be included.
